title.en: Corniglia Weather 2025 | Best Time to Visit Cinque Terre

description.en: Weather guide for Corniglia. Mediterranean climate, best visiting seasons, monthly temperatures, rainfall, and what to pack.

subtitle.en: Mediterranean climate with mild winters and warm summers. Best conditions April-June and September-October.
subtitle.it: Clima mediterraneo mite tutto l'anno. Stagioni diverse offrono esperienze uniche: primavera fiorita, estate balneare, autunno vendemmiale, inverno autentico.

description.en: Perfect weather 18-22°C. Wildflowers bloom, fewer crowds. Ideal for hiking and photography.
description.it: Ideale per trekking. Temperature 15-22°C, fioritura, poca folla. Possibili piogge ad aprile. La stagione perfetta.

description.en: Hot 25-30°C. Peak season, very crowded. Best for swimming, arrives early to avoid crowds.
description.it: Alta stagione. 25-30°C, mare caldo, spiagge, eventi. Molto affollato e caro. Caldo intenso sui sentieri.

description.en: Excellent conditions 20-25°C. Grape harvest season, perfect weather. September rivals spring.
description.it: Eccellente per visite. 18-25°C in settembre, vendemmia, colori caldi. Meno turisti. Piogge in novembre.

description.en: Mild but rainy 10-15°C. Many restaurants closed. Authentic local life, dramatic seas.
description.it: Bassa stagione. 8-15°C, molti servizi chiusi, poca folla. Autentico ma limitato. Presepe di Manarola a dicembre.

description.en: Corniglia's cliff top location means more breeze and sun exposure. Cooler than sea-level villages.
Layers essential year-round. Sun protection, comfortable shoes, light rain jacket. Sweater for evenings.
